constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL SB1  South of the Borough

description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension with Juliet balcony and installation of 2no. front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The erection of rear dormer roof extension with Juliet balcony and installation of 2no. front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B, C and G of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Please submit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.The submitted location plan does not show the two road frontages.
